user.title: Set up dieLiga Scoreboard & Team Monitor
user.description: Monitor your team's league ranking and match results.

data.base_url: Input the base URL from the dieliga that should be tracked. For example: https://www.ost.volleyball-freizeit.de (do not append a '/' at the end).
data.liga_id: Input your liga ID that should be tracked. This ID changes every new season. You can find the ID by opening Schedule & Table in your browser and copying the 4/5 digit ID from there.
data.team_name: Input the name of your team. Spelled exactly as it appears in the dieliga.
data.refresh_time: Input the refresh interval in hours.
